synopsis.text: Feng Xi, a powerful spirit, and Wuxian, a human with unique abilities, are locked in a conflict that young cat spirit Luo Xiaohei finds himself entangled in after his forest home is destroyed by humans. As Xiaohei navigates the complexities of the human and spirit worlds, he must decide where his loyalties lie and what role he will play in the struggle for power. Along the way, he learns to control his abilities and forms unexpected alliances, ultimately leading to the events that will earn him the last name Luo. This prequel film to the popular web series offers a fresh perspective on Xiao Hei's journey and the challenges he faces in a rapidly changing world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
